Package apcs.student

Class Student

java.lang.Object
apcs.student.Student
public class Student
extends java.lang.Object
This class models a single Student and their test scores.
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
JP Kerrane (hi@jameskerrane.com)

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Student​(int id)
    Creates a new instance of Student with the specific id number.
    Student​(java.lang.String name, int id, double test1)
    Creates a new instance of Student with a name, id, and one test score.
    Student​(java.lang.String name, int id, double test1, double test2)
    Creates a new instance of Student with a name, id, and two test scores.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean equals​(java.lang.Object other)
    Returns whether the two students are the same.

    Calculates and returns the average of any tests taken.

    Gets the maximum test score for a student.

    Gets the student's name.

    Gets the full array of test scores for a student.

    Sets the student's name.
    void setScore​(int test, double score)
    Sets/Updates a test score for a Student.

    Converts the object to a string with all of the data for a student.

  • Constructor Details

    • Student

      public Student​(int id)
      Creates a new instance of Student with the specific id number.
      Parameters:
      id - The student's id
      Since:
      1.0.0

    • Student

      public Student​(java.lang.String name, int id, double test1, double test2)
      Creates a new instance of Student with a name, id, and two test scores. The score in test1 and test2 must be 0.0 through 100.0.
      Parameters:
      name - The student's name
      id - The student's id number
      test1 - The student's first test score
      test2 - The student's second test score
      Since:
      1.0.0

    • Student

      public Student​(java.lang.String name, int id, double test1)
      Creates a new instance of Student with a name, id, and one test score. The score is test1 must be 0.0 through 100.0.
      Parameters:
      name - The student's name
      id - The student's id number
      test1 - The student's first test score

  • Method Details

    • getName

      Gets the student's name.
      Returns:

      public void setName​(java.lang.String name)

    • getId

      public int getId()
      Gets the student's id.
      Returns:
      The student's id.
      Since:

    • getScore

      public double getScore​(int test)
      Gets the student's test score that matches the test number. If the test does not exist, -1.0 will be returned.
      Parameters:
      test - The test's number that you want to get a test score from.
      Returns:
      The student's test score that matches the test number. If the test does not exist, -1.0 will be returned.
      Since:
      1.0.0

    • getScores

      public double[] getScores()
      Gets the full array of test scores for a student. Empty scores will be filled with a placeholder of -1.0.
      Returns:
      Array of test scores for a student.
      Since:
      1.0.0

    • setScore

      public void setScore​(int test, double score)
      Sets/Updates a test score for a Student. Returns -1.0 if the test does not exist.
      Parameters:
      test - The test number to update.
      score - The new score
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if test <= 0 or score is not 0.0 through 100.0.
      Since:
      1.0.0

    • getAverage

      public double getAverage()
      Calculates and returns the average of any tests taken.
      Returns:
      The average test score or -1.0 if none have been taken yet.
      Since:
      1.0.0

    • getMaximum

      public double getMaximum()
      Gets the maximum test score for a student.
      Returns:
      The maximum test score for a student.
      Since:
      1.0.0

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Converts the object to a string with all of the data for a student. Whenever there are empty test scores, -1.0 will be filled in as a placeholder.
      Overrides:
      toString in class java.lang.Object
      Returns:
      All of the data for a student. Whenever there are empty test scores, -1.0 will be filled in as a placeholder.
      Since:
      1.0.0

    • equals

      public boolean equals​(java.lang.Object other)
      Returns whether the two students are the same. This is determined if the students have matching ID numbers or not.
      Overrides:
      equals in class java.lang.Object
      Parameters:
      other - Object to compare to
      Returns:
      Whether the two students are the same.
      Since:
      1.0.0
